config-rpm.script: user="rsnapshot" sshdir=/home/$user/.ssh pubkey="%{rsnapshot-server-ssh-pubkey-text}" if [[ ! `grep "$user" /etc/passwd` ]]; then useradd $user fi if [ ! -d $sshdir ]; then mkdir $sshdir fi if [[ ! -e $sshdir/authorized_keys ]] || \ [[ ! `grep "$pubkey" $sshdir/authorized_keys` ]]; then echo $pubkey >> $sshdir/authorized_keys fi chown -R $user:$user $sshdir chmod 700 $sshdir chmod 600 $sshdir/authorized_keys
